Public Delegate Sub PropertyValueChangedEventHandler(s As Object, e As PropertyValueChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void PropertyValueChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ s, PropertyValueChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type PropertyValueChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * PropertyValueChangedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: Um que contém os dados do evento.
